```py
>>> grid = np.indices((2, 3))
>>> grid.shape
(2, 2, 3)
>>> grid[0]        # row indices
array([[0, 0, 0],
 [1, 1, 1]])
>>> grid[1]        # column indices
array([[0, 1, 2],
 [0, 1, 2]]) 
```

```py
>>> x = np.arange(20).reshape(5, 4)
>>> row, col = np.indices((2, 3))
>>> x[row, col]
array([[0, 1, 2],
 [4, 5, 6]]) 
```

```py
>>> i, j = np.indices((2, 3), sparse=True)
>>> i.shape
(2, 1)
>>> j.shape
(1, 3)
>>> i        # row indices
array([[0],
 [1]])
>>> j        # column indices
array([[0, 1, 2]]) 
```
